title: Redesign Services Section with Premium Service Cards

requirements.summary: Restructure the Services section on the homepage with a centered heading 'Our Services' followed by a short 1-line supporting text below it
acceptanceCriteria: Services section has centered 'Our Services' heading
A descriptive 1-line subtitle appears below the heading
Heading and subtitle maintain proper spacing hierarchy

file_operations.description: Update the Services section to add a centered 'Our Services' heading with a descriptive subtitle below it. Ensure proper spacing hierarchy between heading and subtitle using Tailwind spacing utilities.

requirements.summary: Replace existing small icon boxes with large premium service cards, where each card displays: service title (bold, prominent), 2-3 line meaningful description, primary CTA button (Book Appointment / Learn More), optional small icon above title, and proper padding and spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Each service is displayed as a large rectangular card
Service title is bold and prominently displayed
Each card includes a 2-3 line description with softer text color
Each card has a primary CTA button with relevant text (Book Now, Schedule Consultation, or Learn More)
Optional icon appears above the title when appropriate
Cards have generous internal padding and spacing

file_operations.description: Replace the existing service icon boxes with large premium card components. Each card should include: optional small icon at top, bold prominent service title, 2-3 line description with muted text color, primary CTA button with appropriate action text (Book Appointment/Learn More), and generous padding (p-8 or similar). Maintain existing service data but restructure the markup for card-based layout.

requirements.summary: Style service cards with rounded corners (16-20px border radius), soft shadow depth, light background or subtle section contrast, clean premium spacing, and typography hierarchy with large bold titles, softer colored descriptions, and clearly visible CTAs
acceptanceCriteria: Cards have 16-20px rounded corners
Cards have soft shadow depth for premium feel
Cards use light backgrounds with subtle contrast
Typography follows clear hierarchy with large bold titles and softer descriptions
CTA buttons are prominently visible and styled

file_operations.description: Apply premium styling to service cards: use rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl (16-24px) for border radius, add shadow-soft or shadow-premium class for depth, set light background with bg-white or bg-background, establish typography hierarchy with text-2xl font-bold for titles and text-muted-foreground for descriptions, and ensure CTA buttons use existing premium button styles from index.css.

requirements.summary: Implement desktop layout with 2 service cards per row in a spacious grid with equal height cards, and add hover effects including slight lift, shadow increase, and CTA button highlight
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop displays exactly 2 cards per row
Grid layout is spacious with appropriate gaps
All cards in the same row have equal height
On hover, cards lift slightly upward
On hover, card shadow increases in depth
On hover, CTA button shows highlight effect

file_operations.description: Implement desktop grid layout using grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 with gap-8 or gap-12 for spacious layout. Cards should have equal height using grid auto-rows or h-full. Add hover effects with transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-2 hover:shadow-premium classes. Include hover state for CTA buttons with scale or glow effect.

requirements.summary: Implement mobile layout with single column stacked cards at full width, large touch-friendly CTA buttons, and clean vertical spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile view displays cards in single column
Cards span full width on mobile
CTA buttons are large and touch-friendly (minimum 44px height)
Vertical spacing between cards is clean and consistent

file_operations.description: Ensure mobile layout uses single column with grid-cols-1 on mobile breakpoint, cards span w-full, and vertical spacing uses gap-6 or gap-8. CTA buttons should have py-3 px-6 or larger for minimum 44px touch target height. Apply consistent spacing between stacked cards.

requirements.summary: Add micro interactions including smooth scroll reveal animation for service cards, hover lift animation, button subtle glow effect, and 0.3s smooth transitions throughout
acceptanceCriteria: Service cards animate into view on scroll
Cards have smooth lift animation on hover
CTA buttons show subtle glow effect on hover
All transitions use 0.3s duration for smooth feel

file_operations.description: Add scroll-reveal animation to service cards using the existing IntersectionObserver pattern from other pages (opacity-0 translate-y-8 to opacity-100 translate-y-0). Apply transition-all duration-300 to cards for smooth hover lift. Add hover:shadow-glow effect to CTA buttons. Ensure all transitions use 0.3s (duration-300) timing.

requirements.summary: Style CTA buttons with rounded pill design, brand color background, subtle hover scale effect, and optional clean icon
acceptanceCriteria: CTA buttons have rounded pill shape (high border radius)
Buttons use existing brand colors as background
Buttons scale slightly on hover
Optional icons can be included in buttons when appropriate

file_operations.description: Style CTA buttons with rounded-full for pill shape, use existing brand color classes (bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-accent or similar from Layout.tsx), add hover:scale-105 for subtle scale effect with transition-transform duration-300. Include optional icons from lucide-react (e.g., Calendar, ArrowRight) when semantically appropriate.
